Package frontEnd.review

Interface ReviewRepository

All Superinterfaces:
org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<Review,Integer>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<Review,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<Review,Integer>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<Review>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<Review,Integer>
@Repository public interface ReviewRepository extends org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<Review,Integer>

  • Method Details

    • findByCustomer

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.customer.id = ?1") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Review> findByCustomer(Integer customerId, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • findByCustomer

      @Query("SELECT r FROM Review r WHERE r.customer.id = ?1 AND (r.headline LIKE %?2% OR r.comment LIKE %?2% OR r.product.name LIKE %?2%)") org.springframework.data.domain.Page<Review> findByCustomer(Integer customerId, String keyword, org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

    • countByCustomerAndProduct

      @Query("SELECT COUNT(r.id) FROM Review r WHERE r.customer.id = ?1 AND r.product.id = ?2") Long countByCustomerAndProduct(Integer customerId, Integer productId)

    • updateVoteCount

      @Modifying @Transactional @Query(value="UPDATE reviews r SET r.votes = COALESCE((SELECT SUM(v.votes) FROM reviews_votes v WHERE v.review_id = ?1), 0) WHERE r.id = ?1", nativeQuery=true) void updateVoteCount(Integer reviewId)

    • getVoteCount

      @Query("SELECT r.votes FROM Review r WHERE r.id = ?1") Integer getVoteCount(Integer reviewId)
